title: Ontology-Based Instructional Design Course for Smart Game-Based Learning System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Game Design, Basic Educational Concepts, and LMS Management Experience
context.additional_context: A systematic course for practicing professionals to enhance smart game-based learning system design capabilities, emphasizing ontology-driven knowledge structuring and application in online settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the SGBLS design process and its core components.
Learners can develop educational game design scenarios using ontology-based knowledge representation.
Learners can perform peer assessment and feedback using collaboration tools in an LMS environment.
Learners can apply design principles to create a prototype planning document for an actual educational game.

resources: SGBLS video materials for case analysis

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
